release_notes.en-US:
• Changed over to a restartless installation method.
  • Due to nameing conflict the internal name of the Open File button was changed. That will case it to return to Customize Toolbar window.
  • Fixed the toggle proxy button, that was not working right due to the change in the default preference. Also added a Menu.
  • Further patches for SeaMonkey.
  • Menu added to the Add-ons and Toggle Cookies Buttons. Feedback welcome on how people like this being done to various buttons.
  • The Set Multiple Home Pages function on the Set Home Page button as fixed.
  • The translate button now supports multiple translations services.
  • The options window was updated and expanded.
  • Bookmark Manager can now open in a tab, on middle click, or based on a setting.
  • Error Console, if disabled, can now open the Browser Console or Web Console.
  • Fixed the Page Colors button for Firefox 37+
  • Improved translations by importing strings from the Firefox and Thunderbird translations.
  • The Toggle Status Bar button in back in Firefox, and if there is no Status Bar, the button now creates it.
  • Some people have complained there are too many buttons, others that there are not enough. We have taken that to mean there is too much if what you don't want, and not enough of what you do, so we have:
    • Removed some buttons that the Custom Toolbar Button Maker indicates are very rarely used, though they can still be downloaded from there. These buttons are: Toggle Starred, Copy Email, Threads With Unread, Ignored Threads, Unread Threads, Watched Threads with Unread, Change Home, Get Inbox, Read.
    • Added some other buttons that have shown to be much more popular including: Reload, Stop, New Tab, Print, Menu, about:about, Passwords. We have other buttons lined up to be added in the next release.
  • Sunbird support dropped.
  • The compatibility support has changed, so that as a minimum version 29 Firefox/Thunerbird is need.
  • Added a new translation for Slovenian, thanks to Peter Klofutar.
  • Added new buttons to the Mail Header in Thunderbird, including the Zoom in and out buttons.

release_notes.en-US:
• Fixed some icons not showing.
  • Fixed a problem that caused Firefox to hang on startup.
  • Restored the Resize Search Bar button, that had been left out of the previous release.
  • Fixed many of the broken SeaMonkey buttons.
  • Fixed how some windows opened, since they were opening with the wrong size.

release_notes.en-US:
• Many buttons got updated to be comptiable with the latest versions of Firefox and Thunderbird.
  • There are 11 new buttons.
    • Clear Tab
    • Clear Cache
    • Copy Tab
    • Cookie Manager
    • History
    • Open in Conversation
    • Page Media
    • Search Go
    • Show All History
    • Email Headers
    • Address Go
  • Two buttons, the Check for Updates and Tiny Url where dropped due to functionality problems.
  • Added SeaMonkey support.
  • The Toggle Menu Bar button has been put back into Thunderbird.
  • A number of buttons were added to the message header bar in Thunderbird.

release_notes.en-US:
* Full support for Firefox 4.0 and Thunderbird 3.1. Everything should work.
    * Some button were removed:

      Restart Tabbed (Firefox)
          The restart button now does that by default, so since Firefox 2 support is dropped it makes no sense to keep it
      Cut, Copy and Paste (Thunderbird)
          now exist everywhere needed by default so I am dropping my buttons for that.
      Not Junk (Thunderbird)
          Newer versions of Thunerbird now have this by default.

    * Some button had their internal names changed. This will cause them to disapear from the toolbar and return to the customize toolbar window. This only applies to a small number of buttons. Sorry to anyone effected by this.
    * Some new buttons where added. Mainly contributed by others. For this I would like to thank az and Dennis Kadioglu.
          o Popup Blocker Button (Dennis Kadioglu).
          o Clear Search bar (az).
          o Resize Search bar (az) (3 buttons).
          o Twitter (Facebook and youtube will be next).
    * The icon set was changed, it is now using my own. Any feedback is welcome. Though please note the larger icons (the 24x24 size) still need some editing to finish them off. Currently they don't appear nice and sharp like the smaller icons do.
    * In addition to the above there are lots of little extra features and improvements have been added to the buttons.

release_notes.en-US:
*  The rename tab buttons received some doctoring.
    * Had another tinker with the up directory button.
    * Fixed the toggle flash button in Firefox 3 (partly)
    * Restart Tabbed should now work regardless of what your settings are.
    * Open link from clipboard has been fixed (you can access its menu).
    * Document Colors button was starting inverted.
    * Favorite page button had a problem working.
    * Some of the button labels where improved.
    * Improvements the the code that displays the version page. Hopefully there will be no problems now.

The focus of the 0.6 release of Toolbar Buttons has been the fixing of as many bugs as possible before creating new ones ;)

Version 0.6.0.3-4

    * Fixed a problem to do with the customize toolbar window.
    * Fixed a few of the buttons in Sunbird.
    * Updated some of the locales.

Version 0.6.0.1-2

    * Small changes to some of the locales
    * Fixed one small typo

Version 0.6

    * New Buttons
          o  File Menu
          o  Clear URL
          o  Toggle Menu Bar
          o  Edit Menu
          o  Tools Menu
          o  View Menu
          o  Forward as Attachment
          o  Forward as Inline
    * The Link From Clipboard button now opens in a new tab if middle clicked (like the Fx home page buttons)
    * The Bookmark Menu buttons would reopen when a bookmark was clicked, this does not happen anymore.
    * Some of the menu buttons had the drop down arrow removed, since it was superfluous.
    * The get Thunderbird themes/add-ons buttons now exists in both Firefox and Thunderbird
    * Started changing the icons to my own - suggestions on improvements welcome.
    * Changed/Improved how the Up One Directory button works.
    * It is now configurable if the toggle buttons reload the page or not.
    * There is now an option for the path to your email client, should the Read Mail button not work.
    * The quick bookmark button was fixed (in rare cause it was still showing the window).
    * The Customize Toolbar Window now sorts the buttons alphabetically so they can be easily found.
    * Reload Proxy button has some changes for Firefox 3
    * Stop all button should be working right now.
    * The extensions and themes buttons that previously only works in Firefox 1.5 and below now also works in Firefox 3.
    * All toolbar toggling buttons now are kept in sync with their toolbar. (If you notice any button that get out of sync with want it toggles please point it out on the Forums and I will fix it quickly).
    * The toggle status of some of the buttons has been revered
    * Code tided up to some extent

* Send and Receive button now gets new messages for all accounts. * The HTML mode button (chages between viewing the message as HTML, sanatized HTML and Plain text) now exists in both the main window and the read mail window. * Bumped the compatibility up to Firefox 3.0 (not just the betas) * The send link button was not working in Firefox 3.0 * The top/button page buttons also where not working anymore For more info see http://codefisher.org/toolbar_button/version/0.5.0.5

* Fixed the problem with the bookmark menu button where you had to click the arrow to make it do anything (Firefox 3beta only).
* Fixed a bug that prevented the Change Home Page button working sometimes.
* Renamed the "Close Other" button to "Close Other Tabs".
* The Toogle Images and Toggle Java now reload the page.
* Bumped compatibility up to the lates Firefox 3 beta
* Renamed the "Clear Url Bar" to "Hide Url".  Will add a real "Clear Url Bar" to 0.5.5
* Download almost 20% smaller.

# Fixed the page zoom buttons for Firefox 3
# Fixed a typo in the 'Toggle Read' buttons's tooltip
# Fixed a bug in the Real Next/Previous button
# Reverted the implimention of the Read Mail/News buttons to be more reliable in Firefox 2. The Firefox 3 betas still use the less reliable implimention.

Fixed some of the Sunbird buttons that were not working in Sunbird 0.8
Fixed some of the locales.
There are another 16 buttons added and full Firefox 3 support.

General bug fix
 * Save button in compose window fixed
 * delete and skip trash added to the read mail window
 * The install add-on button got a few changes
 * Some new locales were added
 * plus other minor fixes
There was a bug in the extension when it was not installed correctly by Firefox (not sure why that was happening) it should now be handled gracefully.
This version has a number of new buttons, they are prefixed with new* in the above descriptions.  There are 17 in total.
